bool Aurora.Framework.IGenericData.Insert ( string  table,
object[]  values,
string  updateKey,
object  updateValue 
)

Inserts a row into the database insert into 'table' values ('values') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE 'updateKey' = 'updateValue'.

Parameters:
table table name
values All values to be inserted in the correct table order
updateKey If a row is already existing, update this key
updateValue If a row is already existing, update this value
Returns:

Implemented in Aurora.DataManager.DataManagerBase, Aurora.DataManager.MySQL.MySQLDataLoader, and Aurora.DataManager.SQLite.SQLiteLoader.

bool Aurora.Framework.IGenericData.Update ( string  table,
Dictionary< string, object >  values,
Dictionary< string, int >  incrementValues,
QueryFilter  queryFilter,
uint?  start,
uint?  count 
)

UPDATE table SET values[i].key = values[i].value {magic happens with queryFilter here} [LIMIT start[, count]].

Parameters:
table table to update
values dictionary of table fields and new values
incrementValues dictionary of table fields and integer to increment by (use negative ints to decrement)
queryFilter filter to control which rows get updated
start LIMIT start or LIMIT start, count
count LIMIT start, count
Returns:
